sentences.en: A cheap, gaudy St. amboat arrive at the wharf from St. louis.
sentences.cn: 一艘来自圣路易,低廉且华而不实的汽船到达了码头.

sentences.en: A tree covered with tinsel and gaudy paper chains graced one corner.
sentences.cn: 教室的一角被一棵树装点得熠熠生辉,树上缀满了金银丝帛和华丽的彩纸.

sentences.en: Antony Gaudy died in 1926, leaving an unfinished cathedral as his epitaph.
sentences.cn: 安东尼·迪在1926年逝世, 为竟的大教堂是他的墓志铭.

sentences.en: Antony Gaudy died in 1926, leaving an unfinished cathedral as his epitaph.
sentences.cn: 安东尼·高迪在1926年逝世, 为竟的大教堂是他的墓志铭.

sentences.en: Gone are the support suspenders and gaudy steel rings that strangled the tower for much of the last decade.
sentences.cn: 过去十几年间斜塔四周起支撑作用的吊杆和绕在塔身上的华而不实的钢圈现已荡然无存.

sentences.en: Gone were the gaudy signs for Pepsi, Carling, Fujifilm and Vodafone.
sentences.cn: 百事 、 灵 、 士、达丰眩目的广告不见了.

sentences.en: It's a bit too large ( small, plain . gaudy etc. ) for me.
sentences.cn: 这对于我来说太大 ( 太小, 太素,太花哨等 ) 了.

sentences.en: It's just a bit too large ( small, plain, gaudy, etc ) for me.
sentences.cn: 稍微大点 ( 小点 、 一般 、 花点 ).

sentences.en: She also sported a somewhat gaudy gold watch set with diamonds and sapphires.
sentences.cn: 她还收到一块镶着钻石和蓝宝石的华丽的金表.

sentences.en: She could be identified by the gaudy bandanna she wore as a head covering.
sentences.cn: 只要看到有一块绚丽的印花大手帕扎在头上的,那就是她.

sentences.en: She was tricked out in gaudy dress.
She wore a gaudy costume to the party.
sentences.cn: 她着一身色彩艳丽的服装参加宴会.

sentences.en: The gaudy butterfly is sure that the flowers owe thanks to him.
sentences.cn: 浮华的蝴蝶却相信花是应该向它道谢的.

sentences.en: The self - conscious tulip unfolded her petals and carpeted the ground with gaudy colour.
sentences.cn: 含羞的郁金香舒展开她的花瓣,在地上铺上一层炫丽的色彩.

sentences.en: Thus mellowed to that tender light Which heaven to gaudy day denies.
sentences.cn: 柔和在那明亮夜光中炫丽的白天只觉这光太强.

trans.tran_cn: 花哨的，俗气的，华而不实的
trans.tran_en: clothes, colours etc that are gaudy are too bright and look cheap – used to show disapproval
